name: WHEDA
title: Web Analyst
description: Led all web related projects. Defined the process for defining and managing web application development.
responsibilities: Provide direction for all web projects.
Create process for defining and tracking software projects.
Advise on Internet and Web security issues.
Act as a liason with other state agency tech departments implementing iChains.
accomplishments: I was able to get the WHEDA iChains implementation up in less than a year, other state agencies were on their second and third years for similar projects.
The WHEDA iChains implentation became a model for other agencies.
learnings: This was my first exposure to working in a government bureaucracy, I discovered it wasn't to my liking.
I discovered I didn't have to write the software for things to progress quickly.
Led an ASP.net developer team even though I had never written anything in ASP.net.
reasonLeft: I left for a development-centric role with twice the pay of my marketing job.
